title: Network Warning
body:
You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
This happens when after champ select and 5 seconds after I get to 100% on my loading screen, then i get disconnected. If I reconnect b4 the game enterers it repeats The Network Warning. I can only get into the game once the game has started. This is really annoying and gives me an unfair disadvantage. Pls help me fix it and respond as soon as possible. 
Thank you!

replies.body: same problem, repairing didn't help, happens across all accounts. but i can't even get into loading screen or game.

Huh....that's pretty weird that it always disconnects you at 100% o_O. There might be something weird going on with your network settings, so let's check there really quickly as a first step. Update your port forwarding and DNS settings really quickly following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if it helps or not.
Same problema, did the full repair too didn't work. It is happening to me and my friends as well. Only in NA server we play in LAN server too and there we have no issues at all. Sry for bad english.
You're right! I can play on EUW account no problem.... must be something wrong with NA.
